title: Reflective Learning Project to Strengthen Web-Based Science Information Search Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and digital literacy
context.additional_context: Environment supporting real-time collaboration tools and web search history visualization systems

learning_goals: Learners can explain a five-step process for systematically searching complex scientific information on the web.
Learners can analyze their own information search processes at least three times using reflective activity tools and derive improvement strategies.
Learners can improve and implement at least two information search strategies through comparative analysis with peer learners.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
